title: Kevin Pelton and Dr. Robby Sikka
description:
Zach and ESPN's Kevin Pelton discuss Anthony Davis' injury, the Lakers playoffs chances, the red-hot Grizz, gritty Miami Heat, and more. Then Dr. Robby Sikka joins to discuss the NBA's response to another COVID outbreak. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Zach Lowe
